scripts.generate-client: algokit generate client artifacts/ --language typescript  --output clients/{contract_name}Client.ts
scripts.compile-contract: tealscript contracts/actions/*.algo.ts artifacts/actions && tealscript contracts/arc58/*.algo.ts artifacts/arc58 && tealscript contracts/arc58/plugins/*.algo.ts artifacts/arc58/plugins && tealscript contracts/dao/*.algo.ts artifacts/dao && tealscript contracts/gates/*.algo.ts artifacts/gates && tealscript contracts/keys/*.algo.ts artifacts/keys && tealscript contracts/metamerkles/*.algo.ts artifacts/metamerkles
scripts.build: npm run compile-contract && npm run generate-client
